## Description

The **HTML Utils** component provides helpful functions for building and formatting HTML documents.

## Actions

<div id="convertinlinecss" />

### Convert to Inline CSS

Convert an HTML document to use inline styles | <small><b>key: convertInlineCss</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      language: "html",
      example:
        "<html>\n<head>\n   <title>My Webpage</title>\n   <style>div{color:red;}</style>\n</head>\n<body>\n   <div>Hello World</div>\n   <ol>\n     <li>First Item</li>\n     <li>Second Item</li>\n   </ol>\n</body>\n</html>",
      key: "html",
      type: "code",
      default: "",
      label: "HTML",
    },
  ]}
/>

This action leverages the [juice](https://www.npmjs.com/package/juice) NPM package to apply CSS defined in `<style>` tags to inline HTML elements.

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": "<html>\n  <head>\n    <title>My Webpage</title>\n  </head>\n  <body>\n    <div style=\"color: red;\">Hello World</div>\n    <ol>\n      <li>First Item</li>\n      <li>Second Item</li>\n    </ol>\n  </body>\n</html>\n"
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="formathtml" />

### Format HTML

Apply prettier to an HTML document | <small><b>key: formatHtml</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      language: "html",
      example:
        "<html>\n<head>\n   <title>My Webpage</title>\n   <style>div{color:red;}</style>\n</head>\n<body>\n   <div>Hello World</div>\n   <ol>\n     <li>First Item</li>\n     <li>Second Item</li>\n   </ol>\n</body>\n</html>",
      key: "html",
      type: "code",
      default: "",
      label: "HTML",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": "<html>\n  <head>\n    <title>My Webpage</title>\n    <style>\n      div{color:red;}\n    </style>\n  </head>\n  <body>\n    <div>Hello World</div>\n    <ol>\n      <li>First Item</li>\n      <li>Second Item</li>\n    </ol>\n  </body>\n</html>\n"
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="htmltoplaintext" />

### HTML to Plaintext

Convert an HTML document to plaintext | <small><b>key: htmlToPlaintext</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      language: "html",
      example:
        "<html>\n<head>\n   <title>My Webpage</title>\n   <style>div{color:red;}</style>\n</head>\n<body>\n   <div>Hello World</div>\n   <ol>\n     <li>First Item</li>\n     <li>Second Item</li>\n   </ol>\n</body>\n</html>",
      key: "html",
      type: "code",
      default: "",
      label: "HTML",
    },
  ]}
/>

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="striphtmltags" />

### Strip HTML Tags

Remove all HTML tags from a string | <small><b>key: stripHtmlTags</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      language: "html",
      example:
        "<html>\n<head>\n   <title>My Webpage</title>\n   <style>div{color:red;}</style>\n</head>\n<body>\n   <div>Hello World</div>\n   <ol>\n     <li>First Item</li>\n     <li>Second Item</li>\n   </ol>\n</body>\n</html>",
      key: "html",
      type: "code",
      default: "",
      label: "HTML",
    },
  ]}
/>
